metaData.label: Marketing Prospect?
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Teacher/Educator OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head Teacher OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Principal OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Mathematics OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of ICT OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Support OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Science OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of English/Literacy OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal School District Employee

metaData.label: Home User?
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Parent OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Home schooling parent
